com.strato.hidrive.api.oauth

Class OAuthTokenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strato.hidrive.api.oauth.OAuthTokenManager

  • public class OAuthTokenManager
extends Object
    Class responded for oauth token operations. You shouldn't need to use this class directly in your app. Instead, simply configure instance of HiDriveSession to match your preferences.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs OAuthTokenManager with given client id and client secret.
